Author: dotnet
Description:
LLMs and AI Agents have evolved the traditional way for data access - security, smartness, simplicity are top themes. This session unleashes the latest patterns for using Azure Redis for your .NET agentic apps and data modernization. We will look at using Azure Redis with MCP servers, simplifying agentic application development using the MCP protocol, and enhancing your agent with tools that use Redis. We will also go through the latest security enhancement for using Redis in Azure.

Title: Secure and smart AI Agents powered by Azure Redis
